name: Pickler`s triangle
description: Our 3-in-1 set is not just furniture, but a well-thought-out developmental environment for children from 6 months to 5-6 years. Each element plays its role in developing your child's coordination, strength, self-confidence and gross motor skills.
suits: Pickler Triangle: A strong and stable base with comfortable and safe rungs for first ascents and confident climbing.
Double-sided slide/climbing wall: One side is a smooth slide for fun sliding, while the other side is a surface with special grips for climbing, just like a real climbing wall.
Arch: On one side it is a fun swing, and on the other side the inverted arch turns into a tunnel or a low bridge for crossing.
